Utility Classes

Spellbook includes a comprehensive set of utility classes that make it easy to style your content consistently. These styles were originally created for the built-in blocks, but they're available for you to use in your own templates and custom blocks.

Including the Styles

Add the styles to your template with the spellbook_styles template tag:

{% verbatim %}
{% load spellbook_tags %}
<head>
...
{% spellbook_styles %}
...
</head>
{% endverbatim %}
⚠️

Be sure that they are included in the head of your HTML, preferrably in your base template or a `% block extra_css %', to make sure all extended templates will benefit.
